message: My turn! How about a slightly more even split this time? 5250 for me, 4750 for you.
I'll compromise a bit, 58% for me
Time is running out!  This is a small concession on my part.  Let's close the deal and both benefit.
Come on, meet me in the middle of our last offers
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this. We both lose if this drags on.
